title: English Project - Free English Learning Lessons
description: Master English with 500+ free lessons! Interactive exercises, grammar guides, vocabulary builders & speaking practice. From beginner to advanced. Join 100k+ learners worldwide.
user_comment: This JSON feed provides programmatic access to English Project's latest lessons and content updates. Perfect for developers building educational apps or content aggregators.

items.title: Interactive Discourse Analysis - Advanced Level
items.content_html: Master advanced discourse analysis techniques with interactive exercises. Learn to analyze text structure, coherence, and persuasive language patterns in academic and professional contexts.
